description: When a strong, self- dependent and bold lady, Vipasha, known to her friends as Vee, makes a choice that changes everything, she is left to wonder if life really holds any reason at all. The story starts with Vee lying in a hospital after making the biggest decision in her short 18-year-old life.
title: It Happens For a Reason

description: Stay Hungry Stay Foolish portrays the success stories of 25 entrepreneurs, who graduated from IIM Ahmadabad. Instead of a picking a high paying 9 to 5 job, they chose the rough road to success.
title: Stay Hungry Stay Foolish
